response.summary:
experiencia en pruebas y habilidades para investigar, diagnosticar, diseñar, construir, evaluar y auditar sistemas informáticos. Conocimiento en bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales, pruebas
funcionales y no funcionales, automatización con .Net y JAVA, utilizando screenplay y POM, con aptitudes para el manejo de pruebas en los diferentes ciclos de vida del software, metodologías tradicionales y marcos de trabajo agiles como scrum.

Automatización con Selenium C# y Java
Automatización con Screenplay y POM
Automatización de servicios Rest
Analisis, diseño y ejecución de casos, plan y estrategia de pruebas
Gestión de ambientes de pruebas
Documentación de pruebas
Reporte y seguimiento de incidencias 
Pruebas de Carga y Stress
response.skills: Pruebas de integración, Herramientas de automatización de pruebas, Estrategia de pruebas, Administración de pruebas, Pruebas del sistema, Java, Aseguramiento de la calidad, Pruebas manuales, Git, Appium, Metodologías ágiles, Casos de prueba, JIRA, Pruebas de software, Pruebas de regresión, SQL, Desarrollo de software, Scrum, Automatización de pruebas, Software

profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de Calidad de Software Senior
Analista de calidad de software intermedio

company.name: Choucair Testing S.A.
company.description: Choucair is a pioneer company in software testing in Latin America. It has more than 18 years of experience, keeping its focus on such discipline, which gives it a great authority and objectivity in the software quality area. Choucair has executed more than thirty thousand testing projects in eleven countries and has created a new category in that market: Business Centric Testing. Companies face the challenge to continue being relevant in the new digital era, where the word value is redefined for all users and the game rules have been changed, as well as the ways we are in contact with each other, negotiate and consume; that is why companies are constantly in the need to reinvent themselves and digitize their business model. In this process, companies seek to minimize their risks, optimize their opportunities and, above all, achieve its strategy, aligning it with its technological environment to materialize its value promise with its clients and users. In Choucair, we are conscious of that kind of challenge, that is why we are obsessed with the success of our clients’ business models in the digital transformation and we test with excellence their technological environment, focusing in its strategy and business to develop its competitive advantage. Here, we do not test software, we test how technology boosts our clients’ dreams in the new digital environment.

location.address: Cr 52 # 14 -30 Local 421 Centro Empresarial Olaya Herrera Medellín - Colombia
